overview: Daniel is one of the founders of ConectaGames. He is involved in all the decisions, organizations and strategy of this new startup. Prior to founding ConectaGames, Daniel helped build Intercanal, the largest pirvate ISP in Uruguay, and VOIP carrier. Before he founded Web2mil, and internet service provider. Web2mil founded in 1995, is one of the oldest internet companies in Uruguay. It has been responsible for the early adoption of IT in many corporations in the country, and the seed for very creative applications of internet technology. Daniel has Master of Science in physics degree and BS in engineering physics degree from the Universit of Vermont. Holds also a degree in Physics from the Universidad de la Republica de Montevideo Uruguay, and a Diploma in Economics from the Instituto de Estudios Economicos de Montevideo.
